languages.text: "Как бы Чорда ни хотела думать, что вышибла Касбаллику с Футфола — это не так. Мы рассеялись по станции, залегли на дно, и нас все еще хватает, чтобы доставить неприятности".

traits.locale_text: "Как бы Чорда ни хотела думать, что вышибла Касбаллику с Футфола — это не так. Мы рассеялись по станции, залегли на дно, и нас все еще хватает, чтобы доставить неприятности".

languages.text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."
languages.original_text: "Как бы Чорда ни хотела думать, что вышибла Касбаллику с Футфола — это не так. Мы рассеялись по станции, залегли на дно, и нас все еще хватает, чтобы доставить неприятности".

traits.locale_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."
"However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."
"However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."
"However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."
"However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."
"However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

languages.text: “哪怕库尔达再怎么以为她已经把卡斯巴利卡踢出了落脚港，事事都并非如此。我们的人分散在这座星站各个区域，低调行事。我们还有足够的人手可以制造麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

traits.locale_text: “哪怕库尔达再怎么以为她已经把卡斯巴利卡踢出了落脚港，事事都并非如此。我们的人分散在这座星站各个区域，低调行事。我们还有足够的人手可以制造麻烦。”

languages.text: 「チョーダはフットフォールからカスバリカを追い出したと、どうしても信じたいようだが、それは間違っている。ステーション中に散らばり、問題を起こすくらい可能だ」
languages.original_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダはフットフォールからカスバリカを追い出したと、どうしても信じたいようだが、それは間違っている。ステーション中に散らばり、問題を起こすくらい可能だ」

languages.text: «Por mucho que Chorda quiera creer que ha echado a la Kasballica de Paso, no es así. Estamos dispersos por toda la estación, agazapados, y todavía somos suficientes para causar problemas».
languages.original_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Por mucho que Chorda quiera creer que ha echado a la Kasballica de Paso, no es así. Estamos dispersos por toda la estación, agazapados, y todavía somos suficientes para causar problemas».

languages.text: "So sehr Chorda auch glauben möchte, dass sie die Kasballica von Footfall geworfen hat, das hat sie nicht. Wir sind auf der gesamten Station verteilt, wir sind untergetaucht, und es gibt noch genug von uns, um reichlich Ärger zu machen."
languages.original_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

traits.locale_text: "So sehr Chorda auch glauben möchte, dass sie die Kasballica von Footfall geworfen hat, das hat sie nicht. Wir sind auf der gesamten Station verteilt, wir sind untergetaucht, und es gibt noch genug von uns, um reichlich Ärger zu machen."

languages.text: « Même si Chorda aime à croire qu'elle a chassé la Kasballica de Castel, c'est faux. Nous devons faire profil bas, mais nous sommes disséminés dans toute la station et encore assez nombreux pour lui poser problème. »
languages.original_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Même si Chorda aime à croire qu'elle a chassé la Kasballica de Castel, c'est faux. Nous devons faire profil bas, mais nous sommes disséminés dans toute la station et encore assez nombreux pour lui poser problème. »

languages.text: "Chorda, Kasballica'yı Binliman'dan defettiğini sanıyor ama yanılıyor. İstasyonun dört bir köşesine yayıldık, saklanıyoruz. Sayımız da canını sıkmaya yeter."
languages.original_text: "However much Chorda would like to believe she's kicked the Kasballica out of Footfall, she hasn't. We're scattered all over the station, lying low, and there's still enough of us to cause trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Chorda, Kasballica'yı Binliman'dan defettiğini sanıyor ama yanılıyor. İstasyonun dört bir köşesine yayıldık, saklanıyoruz. Sayımız da canını sıkmaya yeter."
